description: This file defines Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) related to authentication processes, including login requests, registration requests, and authentication responses.

classes.name: LoginRequest
classes.description: DTO for user login containing email and password.

classes.name: RegisterRequest
classes.description: DTO for user registration including email, password, and full name.

classes.name: AuthResponse
classes.description: DTO representing the response after authentication, including token details and expiration.
